Lyric:
[00:17.890]I never felt nothing in the world like this before
[00:21.220]Now I'm missing you
[00:22.970]And I'm wishing that you would come back through my door
[00:26.729]Why did you have to go?
[00:29.360]You could have let me know
[00:31.619]So now I'm all alone
[00:34.200]Girl you could have stayed
[00:35.570]But you wouldn't give me a chance
[00:37.760]With you not around it's a little bit more then I can stand
[00:43.500]And all my tears they keep running down my face
[00:48.600]Why did you turn away?
[00:50.610]So why does your pride make you run and hide?
[00:54.370]Are you that afraid of me?
[00:59.200]But I know it's a lie what you keep inside
[01:02.760]This is not how you wanted to be
[01:06.330]So baby I will wait for you
[01:10.300]Cause I don't know what else I can do
[01:14.700]Don't tell me I ran out of time
[01:18.840]If it takes the rest of my life
[01:22.930]Baby I will wait for you
[01:26.970]If you think I'm fine it just aint true
[01:30.960]I really need you in my life
[01:35.359]No matter what I have to do I'll wait for you
[01:41.500]It's been a long time since you called me
[01:44.320](How could you forget about me)
[01:45.380]You got me feeling crazy (crazy)
[01:48.660]Oooooo
[01:50.489]How can you walk away
[01:52.340]Everything stays the same
[01:54.700]I just can't do it baby
[01:57.789]What will it take to make you come back
[02:01.400]Girl I told you what it is and it just ain't like that
[02:06.240]Why can't you look at me
[02:08.907]Your still in love with me
[02:10.939]Don't leave me crying.
[02:13.698]Baby why can't we just start over again
[02:17.499]Get it back to the way it was
[02:21.388]If you give me a chance I can love you right
[02:25.509]But your telling me it wont be enough
[02:28.909]So baby I will wait for you
[02:33.269]Cause I don''t know what else I can do
[02:37.349]Don't tell me I ran out of time
[02:41.548]If it takes the rest of my life
[02:45.529]Baby I will wait for you
[02:49.719]If you think I'm fine it just aint true
[02:53.698]I really need you in my life
[02:57.969]No matter what I have to do I'll wait for you
[03:02.819]So why does you pride make you run & hide
[03:07.209]Are you that afraid of me?
[03:11.390]But I know it's a lie what your keeping inside
[03:15.269]That is not how you wanted to be
[03:19.328]Baby I will wait for you
[03:27.990]Baby I will wait for you
[03:31.698]If it's the last thing I do
[03:35.480]baby I will wait for you
[03:39.689]Cause I don''t know what else I can do
[03:43.689]Don't tell me I ran out of time
[03:47.709]If it takes the rest of my life
[03:51.998]Baby I will wait for you
[03:55.909]If you think I'm fine it just aint true
[03:59.888]I really need you in my life
[04:04.268]No matter what I have to do I'll wait for you
[04:11.929]I'll Be Waiting.
